title: TGM Skateboards Paris ABEC 9 Longboard Upgrade Package 180mm Trucks 66mm Black DREGS Wheels
description: This is the ultimate upgrade pack available at the best price on the market. Here you get Paris 180mm Trucks, Dregs Race Formula wheels, & Speedy Warp 9 bearings, with a set of 1.5" Hardware. Everything you need to upgrade your current deck or start a new set up! The paris 180 was designed to be an awesome all around longboard truck. 50 degree baseplate angle helps to give you an awesome turning radius and USA made bushings give you the best ride possible. Made with grade 8 kingpins and axles, with a 6-hole baseplate design. 66MM 81A.Dregs wheels are proudly made in the USA with premium urethane by labeda. These 66mm Race formula wheels offer high speed, roll, and traction. At 81a, they will also break loose for sliding. The offset core design is perfect for downhill speed slides. Set of 8 Warpspeed bearings feature hardened steel balls and a nylon ball retainer. These bearings will guarantee the speed you need.
